name: edge of the night
description:
Play as a young vampire, the world of vampires is so overcrowded that during the day, only a few are allowed to stay. So every night they send out the weakest to kill as many animals as they can find. Only the boss will return.

If the game doesn't load visit: https://dolphinbert.itch.io/edge-of-the-nightdownload

for a download version

Controls:

-W, A, S, D, space
